summary:
Encheliophis is a genus of pearlfishes, with seven currently recognized species:Encheliophis boraborensis (Kaup, 1856) 
Encheliophis chardewalli Parmentier, 2004
Encheliophis gracilis (Bleeker, 1856) 
Encheliophis homei (J. Richardson, 1846) 
Encheliophis sagamianus (S. Tanaka, 1908)
Encheliophis vermicularis J. P.
